meaningMnemonic: <radical>Happiness</radical> is a <radical>circle</radical> that's <kanji>tenacious</kanji>. In other words, we're all in this circle/cycle where we do whatever we can to grab onto happiness and hold it as tightly as we can.
readingMnemonic: Happiness is as <kanji>tenacious</kanji> as a <reading>shih tzu</reading> (しつ) with a <reading>shoe</reading> (しゅう). That little dog does not want to give up on the shoe, no matter what's happening around it.
